generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface with parked cars on the left and a path on the right indicates a road.
- sidewalk: The path on the right side of the road, separated by black posts, is designated for pedestrians.
- building: A brick building with windows is visible in the background on the right side.
- fence: A chain-link fence with a white tarp is visible on the far right.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk on the right.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign (yield sign) is visible on a pole in the middle distance.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible throughout the image.
- terrain: Grass and fallen leaves are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the left side of the road.
- person: A person is visible walking in the distance on the right side of the road.
